code: import api from'./api';export const enquiryService={createEnquiry:async enquiryData=>{const response=await api.post('/enquiries',enquiryData);return response.data;},getInstituteEnquiries:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/enquiries/institute');return response.data;},getUserEnquiries:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/enquiries/user');return response.data;},updateEnquiryStatus:async(enquiryId,status)=>{const response=await api.put("/enquiries/".concat(enquiryId,"/status"),{status});return response.data;},respondToEnquiry:async(enquiryId,response)=>{const res=await api.put("/enquiries/".concat(enquiryId,"/respond"),{response});return res.data;}};
